TextView.android:text: How to start with offline search

* Go to http://download.geofabrik.de/osm and download PBF file for needed region
 * Open Settings > Imported DB > Import PBF...
 * Select downloaded file and confirm import
 * Importing process will start in background, you can control progress in notification area. The process may take some time, dependently of PBF size
 * After import finishes, you can select 'DB' in Settings > Search source and start using the app
 Thats all.
